desc: 7 Secrets is a all natural hair and skin care line created by a licensed cosmetologist with over 20 years in the business. Her experience with her clients helped her create this line that targets all of needs of the scalp, hair and skin without any chemicals. She believes God gave us everything we need on this earth.

layout.text: Created To Organically Heal & Treat Scalp & Skin Issues While Growing Full Healthy Hair.
